results.text: Deal #1: PlaySafe ID Company PlaySafe ID Sector Cybersecurity Round Pre-seed Amount Raised 1.40 M$ Country United Kingdom Website https://playsafeid.com Tags Gaming Security, Identity Verification, Privacy, Fair Play, Digital ID Description: PlaySafe ID is a UK-based cybersecurity platform focused on creating a safer and fairer online gaming environment by issuing anonymised, game-agnostic digital IDs that verify players as real and free from cheating or inappropriate behavior towards children.

Company | Sector | Round | Amount | Similar Found
PlaySafe ID | Cybersecurity | Pre-seed | 1.40 M$ | 1
Executive Summary Company Sector Round Amount Similar Found PlaySafe ID Cybersecurity Pre-seed 1.40 M$ 1

Utilizing zero-knowledge verification in partnership with Entrust, PlaySafe ID protects player privacy while enabling developers and communities to enforce fair play and child safety standards across multiple games. The platform targets online gaming platforms, multiplayer game developers, and gaming communities, aiming to become a universal trust layer in the gaming ecosystem. Recently, PlaySafe ID raised $1.12M in pre-seed funding to accelerate platform expansion and integrations with major

Company | PlaySafe ID
Sector | Cybersecurity
Round | Pre-seed
Amount Raised | 1.40 M$
Country | United Kingdom
